field.label: Enable
field.help: This will activate the Zabbix Proxy service.

field.label: Proxy Mode
field.help: Active (default) or passive mode, only switch to passive if you know what you are doing.

field.label: Server
field.help: IP address or hostname of Zabbix server.

field.label: Server Port
field.help: Port of Zabbix trapper on Zabbix server. Default is fine for most scenarios.

field.label: Hostname
field.help: The name of this Zabbix instance. It has to match with the defined name in the central Zabbix server.

field.label: Listen IP
field.help: List of comma delimited IP addresses that the trapper should listen on. Trapper will listen on all network interfaces if this parameter is missing.

field.label: Listen Port
field.help: Listen port for trapper. Default is just fine.

field.label: Source IP
field.help: Source IP address for outgoing connections.

field.label: Start Pollers
field.help: Number of pre-forked instances of pollers.

field.label: Start IPMI Pollers
field.help: Number of pre-forked instances of IPMI pollers.

field.label: Start Pollers Unreachable
field.help: Number of pre-forked instances of pollers for unreachable hosts (including IPMI and Java).

field.label: Start Trappers
field.help: Number of pre-forked instances of trappers. Trappers accept incoming connections from Zabbix sender and active agents.

field.label: Start Pingers
field.help: Number of pre-forked instances of ICMP pingers.

field.label: Start Discoverers
field.help: Number of pre-forked instances of discoverers.

field.label: Start HTTP Pollers
field.help: Number of pre-forked instances of HTTP pollers.

field.label: Cache Size
field.help: Size of configuration cache, in bytes. Shared memory size, for storing hosts and items data. Range: 128K-8G

field.label: History Cache Size
field.help: Size of history cache in bytes. Shared memory size for storing history data. Range: 128K-2G

field.label: History Index Cache Size
field.help: Size of history index cache in bytes. Shared memory size for indexing history cache. Range: 128K-2G

field.label: Timeout
field.help: Specifies how long we wait for agent, SNMP device or external check (in seconds).
